productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: This hybrid 2-in-1 liquid helps soften, hydrate, and strengthen skin's moisture barrier.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Results You Can See! This hypoallergenic skin savior combines a rich cream with liquid toner for intense, soothing hydration that absorbs quickly without feeling heavy. Featuring Ceramide and Peptide Complex to deeply nourish and support skin’s moisture barrier. Say hello to soothed, happy, hydrated skin!
Cream Skin Toner & Moisturizer Clinical Results

Cream Skin Toner & Moisturizer is Now Refillable A comforting, milky cream & toner hybrid—now refillable! Enriched with nourishing ceramides and peptides for radiant, hydrated skin. The cream Skin refill pouch is not resealable. Please only cut, open, and pour once bottle is finished to maintain maximum freshness. Turn your Cream Skin into a Refreshing Mist! Compatible with the full-size Cream Skin bottle. Refresh skin’s hydration throughout the day, or spritz all over after makeup for a dewy glow! This pump creates a super fine mist to evenly distribute Cream Skin softly over the skin.
Previous page Next page 1 AM Routine 2 PM Routine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Restocked and still using it everyday!
reviews.reviewText: When it comes to skincare, finding a product that truly does double duty can be a game-changer. The LANEIGE Cream Skin Toner & Moisturizer is one such product that has earned a permanent place in my skincare routine, and I am thrilled to share my experience with it.Hydration Powerhouse (5/5):Laneige's Cream Skin Toner & Moisturizer is like a drink of water for your skin. Its unique formula combines the benefits of a toner and moisturizer, providing intense hydration without any heaviness or greasiness. From the very first use, I noticed how it instantly plumped and refreshed my skin, leaving it soft and supple. This product is a savior for those with dry or dehydrated skin, as it helps lock in moisture all day long.Ceramides and Peptides (5/5):What sets this product apart is its inclusion of ceramides and peptides, two powerhouse ingredients known for their skin-repairing and anti-aging properties. Ceramides help strengthen the skin's natural barrier, while peptides promote collagen production, leading to firmer and more youthful-looking skin. The combination of these ingredients makes this toner & moisturizer not just hydrating but also incredibly beneficial for long-term skin health.Lightweight and Fast-Absorbing (5/5):One of the key selling points of this product is its lightweight, watery consistency. Unlike traditional creams and lotions, it goes on like a liquid and absorbs almost instantly, making it suitable for all skin types, including oily and combination. It doesn't leave any residue or stickiness behind, making it a perfect choice for layering under makeup or other skincare products.Versatility (5/5):The versatility of LANEIGE Cream Skin Toner & Moisturizer is impressive. Whether you're looking to simplify your skincare routine or need a hydration boost, this product can be used as a toner, moisturizer, or both. I often use it as a toner to prep my skin for other products or as a refreshing mist throughout the day to revive tired skin.Soothing and Calming (5/5):If you have sensitive or irritated skin, this product is a soothing balm. It calms redness, reduces irritation, and has a gentle, comforting effect on the skin. I've noticed a significant reduction in redness and sensitivity since incorporating it into my routine.In conclusion, the LANEIGE Cream Skin Toner & Moisturizer is a skincare superstar. Its unique formula, enriched with ceramides and peptides, provides unparalleled hydration and long-term skin benefits. The lightweight texture, versatility, and soothing properties make it a must-have for anyone seeking a simplified yet effective skincare routine. It has become my go-to product for achieving radiant, healthy skin, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to skincare enthusiasts of all ages and skin types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Melts into your skin !
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the price a little will go a long way I’ve had it for almost a month and barely used any. It melts into your skin no burning and I have extremely sensitive skin ! Run and get it my skin products melt into my face with this product never using anything else ☺️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST PURCHASE OF MY LIFE
reviews.reviewText: My skin is literally glowing, Im a full time content creator doing skincare and sharing items that could help others achieve their goals! Overall this was my favorite product my skin feels so smooth and delicate…I totally recommend buying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this Product!=...the Price...Not so much.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used tons of toners over the past few decades because they help prevent hair bumps from shaving. I had never tried Laneige’s cream toner because for one thing, I had never heard of the brand. For another, it was WAY out of my drugstore budget for such personal items. The price is the only reason I gave this four, rather than five stars and I’m still not sure I should have done that since I feel it’s worth the money.I have dry, sensitive, skin with large pores and this toner seems to be addressing all of my issues. I love that my skin truly feels hydrated after I apply it. I don’t use cotton balls as I used to with other toners. Rather, I just shake a few drops into my hands and apply to my face.I travel a lot and I keep at least two bottles at all times, one of which stays perpetually packed in my suitcase. It’s perfect under my makeup and though I do use a face serum on top, it eliminates the need for moisturizer. All of that said, nearly $40 is quite steep for me. I'm used to trying to gain as much value for as little as possible but the ease of use and outcomes I get from its use justify this as an expense for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Laneige cream skin toner & moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Finally, I found what I was looking for! I was initially looking for a serum but this treatment is perfect for dry skin! It does exactly what I was looking for! It moisturizes but doesn't feel sticky afterwards, it makes my skin feel wonderdul! It give me the moisture boost I need without being overly heavy or overly matte. This product also has no scent at all which is great because other fragrance free products I've tried end up havinf a weird smell.Love love love this! I bought the mist spray top too so, I don't lose any product down my hands!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bottle lasts a while as you don't need much for full coverage. Leaves face feeling and looking smooth. Very refreshing! 10/10 recommend for self or gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product has done wonders for my dry, dull winter skin. I receive compliments on the glowiness of my face daily after applying at night, in the morning and periodically throughout the day when my skin feels dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice toner but nothing too special and fancy.. I don’t think it’s worth the money. Will I buy it again? Maybe.

Title: Skin Savior: [Moisturizer Toner Name] ReviewI saw this in my daughter’s room and she raved about it, I was skeptical, but it blew me away. I ordered my own bigger bottle the next day!! It's a game-changer for my skin and makeup. Lightweight yet powerful, it hydrates and primes skin like a dream. Makeup goes on smoother and lasts longer. It is a must-have for anyone serious about skincare and makeup.

El envío estuvo bien, justo el tiempo que decía y el producto es sensacional. Al principio creí que por el tamaño sería una mala compra pero tan solo un poco de líquido humecta bastante la cara. Lo comparo con mis otras cremas para el rostro y es incluso mejor. Lo volvería a comprar

reviews.reviewTitle: It is an Original product however doesn’t fit all laneige big bottles
reviews.reviewText: The product is fine and authentic however doesn’t not fit into 150ml cream skin refiner bottle.Please read the dimensions and size before ordering
It's a toner with a moisturiser.it moisturises the skin without making it oily

I love this toner so much as a dry skin girlie, this is probably my 10th or 11th bottle by now. Goes on as a toner leaves the feeling of a moisturizer. *extremely* hydrating!!! If you have oily skin I wouldnt suggest this toner for you.
